that "the game has changed from a battle of devices to a war of ecosystems". "An ecosystem with Microsoft and Nokia has unrivalled scale around the globe," he said. Nokia and Microsoft working together can drive innovation that is at the boundary of hardware, software and services, said Microsoft chief executive Steve Ballmer . Microsoft's Bing will power Nokia's search services, while Nokia Maps would be a core part of Microsoft's mapping services. The BBC reports the new strategy

It can happen to any place in the world, said Zahi Hawass , who faces demands for higher wages from antiquities workers who demonstrated outside his office this week. Nobody is above the law, no newspaper editor, no journalist. Scotland Yard has declined to respond to the latest allegations. Mr Andy Coulson has denied knowledge of any hacking, but stepped down on Friday over the continuing media coverage of the issue.

her eyes. "When her husband saw her making this effort he urged her and said Gabrielle Giffords open your eyes, open your eyes. And sure enough she did," said Kirsten Gillibrand . I was there when she was surrounded by her friends in the Congress and Senate. And I think it was a combination, perhaps, of the unexpected and the familiar that really prompted her to open her eyes and look around, said her doctor, Dr. Michael Lemole. But it was Gabrielle Giffords ' husband's reaction to this milestone that made Kirsten Gillibrand realize this was the very first time Gabrielle Giffords had opened her eyes since being shot.
